committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution requesting the President to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the date of the enactment of the Small Business Act and the establishment of the Small Business Administration.

summary.text: Requests the President of the United States to designate July 18, 1978, as "Small Business Day."

titles.title: A joint resolution requesting the President to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the date of the enactment of the Small Business Act and the establishment of the Small Business Administration.
